features: Easy Tightening and No More Loosening Up: This upgraded dust pan and broom set features advanced PowerThread technology and upgrades 2 more threads for easy tightening. According to lab statistics, the service life has increased by 2 times compared to the previous broom and dust pan set heavy duty.

Space-saving Broom with Stand-Up Dustpans: The snap-on upright dustpan with its unique TrippingGuard design of the dustpan pole provides more secure vertical storage. Maintain a clean and tidy home or work space at all times. The lightweight design of the brooms and dustpans sets provides you with an effortless dump and dustpan closure.

Adjustable 51" Pole Broom: The Tiumso tall broom offers 28.7'' to 51" of optional pole length to meet different cleaning needs. Designed to perfectly fit your floor with Zero Gap and ShapeShield, effectively collecting fine particles while preventing spills, helping you save over 50% of the time. Perfect for household cleaning.

Self-cleaning Comb Teeth: This broom dust pan set comes with new customized curved comb teeth with graduated widths to help refresh your broom. With durable material, the teeth effortlessly separate entangled hair and minute particles, allowing you to smoothly scrub the bristles free from lint or hair without having to pull it off with your fingers.

Effortless Cleaning: The width of the broom is 12 inches, covering a wider area in a single sweep than others. Ten square feet takes only about six turns for a fresh look! Customized with 5 layers of soft and stiff bristles made of recycled plastic, with special split-end bristle technology for quick cleaning (It will make the broom look used, but it's a completely new design for better cleaning).
The broom looks used because of the special split-end bristle technology, but it is totally newly designed for fine cleaning. If any assistance is needed, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Built in Comb Teeth Make cleaning up a fun activity with broom dustpan, perfect for your little one and furry friend. Clean Up For Outdoor Floor Tiumso a broom and dustpan combo, can sweep away the outdoor garbage easily! Easy to Use PowerThread Technology Our innovative technology can prevent the handle from coming loose, making it easy to collect dirt. No Loose Split-End Bristle Technology Not only do they add a touch of efficiency, but they also ensure thorough cleaning in every corner. Deep Sweep ZeroGap Technology Elevate your cleaning routine by closely hugging the ground, allowing for efficient cleaning. Fits Tightly

Previous page Hold the pole of the dustpan in your hand and lightly step on the dustpan with one foot. With a slight force on the foot, lift the hand holding the pole while tilting it forward. Lift the pole upward until the dustpan will stay upright. Place the metal part of the broom into the clip on the dustpan. Next page 1 Tiumso Instruction 2 Installation Step 1 3 Installation Step 2 4 Installation Step 3 5 Storage Step 1

Will the bristles bend out of shape if sweep under stuff? Nope, they are made up of 5 customized layers of Soft and Stiff Bristles with Split-End Bristle Technology which is good for indoor and outdoor sweeping. Will dustpan handle remain in upright position while using instead of continually falling down? Yes, it stays upright when using it. And this snap-on upright dustpan with its unique TrippingGuard Design of the dustpan pole provides more secure vertical storage. Is the lip of the dustpan flat to the floor so the smallest dust go into the pan and not leave dust bunnies behind? Yes, it comes with ZeroGap Technology, which allows a better fit with the floor and removes 99% dust&dirt in one sweep. What's more, the Handsfree Comb helps you clear the broom of pet fur and human hair with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is made very well
reviews.reviewText: Good buy I like it, Its worth the money .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works fine, but....
reviews.reviewText: It works well enough. The softer bristles help get the dusty bits. The "comb" for cleaning hair clumps is nice.One design flaw. The dust bin should be bigger. It's Impossible to get the broom into the bin without a bunch if bristles getting caught and bent all over the place. My brand new broom looks 10 yrs old because the bristles are flayed out all over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most functional broom I've owned
reviews.reviewText: Love that it can stand up on its own. It is sturdy and very functional. The best broom I've owned yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this broom and dust pan set to replace a cheaper-made one that had seen better days. This set is so much better and well made than the previous one! The material seems sturdy, but it's not too heavy to work with. Both the broom and dust pan work well to sweep up dirt off the floor. Overall, it's a great set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love this, especially the comb that clears the broom into the pan. Nice. The handles are adequate, if a little on the light side. They are not thick enough to put up with much abuse, like if the handle gets knocked down and you accidentally step on it. It won't survive that kind of "use". However, they are adequate if you take care of it. If something does happen, it appears to be a standard broom handle thread, so they are likely easily replaced with better handles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small addition to dustpan makes all the difference
reviews.reviewText: It's a broom and dustpan, what can I say about a broom and dustpan? A lot apparently! I've been using brooms and dustpans for 40 years, and I thought I had hit the pinnacle of dust picking up when I got a stand up dustpan, no more bending over like you had to do with the old school dustpans. What this set has is the addition of the teeth that clean the broom off completely. The broom itself is soft and sweeps well and the handles are durable, but the teeth take it to the next level, if there are levels in dustpans. It comes in a small package but goes together quickly and easily. Just screw the handles together and you are done. If you are in the market for a upgraded broom and dustpan this set is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Tiumso Broom and Dustpan Set have been a real game-changer in our home, especially with our Golden Retriever's hair constantly making its way into every corner. The 51'' long handle makes cleaning a breeze, and the large dustpan and broom efficiently pick up even stubborn pet hair. What I particularly love is the comb on top of the dustpan, which is perfect for removing the hair from the bristles. It's a simple but incredibly effective addition that has made our cleaning routine much more efficient. The grey and orange color scheme is a nice touch too. This set has become an essential tool in our home for both pet hair and everyday cleaning needs!
